messages.subject: Forget teaching. What does convention actually *model* to our kids?
messages.msgSnippet: ... who don t listen to them.
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>The kids don't listen because they've learned it from their parents,
who don't listen to them.<<<<<

Telling kids what to do is not modeling what to do.

A huge part of the unschooling journey (and re-parenting oneself) is to
realize *what* exactly it is we're modeling to our kids.

Thanks so much, Beth, for the way you put the above remark I quoted. It's
what a lot of people don't get about unschooling or parenting. It's been
said before and could stand to be said again and then highlighted.

That'd be a great page for Joyce or Sandra's site.

So here... I've start a thread on it: What does much of conventional
parenting actually model to children?

~Katherine
